title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Natural Emeralds (3.94 carats total). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and shine.
features: This striking haaram boasts a geometric chevron pattern set with pav√© diamonds along the neckline, leading to intricate filigree pendants. The pendants showcase lush green emeralds at their centers, surrounded by a delicate diamond floral motif. Dangling gold beads add movement and a touch of traditional South Indian charm. The arrangement has a modern, layered feel, perfect for the contemporary bride.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional and modern aesthetics. The dazzling diamonds and vibrant emeralds offer a regal appearance, enhanced by the superior craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish. This haaram is a valuable investment that will be cherished for generations. Its modern design makes it versatile enough for both traditional and contemporary ensembles. The use of genuine gemstones assures value and lasting beauty.
